main.name: NICOLE WALLACE
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Hello, I'm Nicole! I switched my gears from my education in Business to take on Web Development to keep challenging myself in ways I thought I never could. Web Development allows me to continually create and creatively find new ways to make processes better. I always believed that anything can be improved and there are different ways to solve problems. With that being said, I am Full Stack Web Developer based in the San Francisco Bay Area with a Bachelorâ€™s Degree and 2+ years professional experience in Business Administration combined with 3 different Liberal Arts degrees. I am a naturally curious person which makes me want to always learn new things. I am a problem-solver who questions everything. I am a hard worker who doesn't take life too seriously and enjoys the little things. You will always find a smile on my face.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor's of Science in Business Administration and Management

Associate's of Science in Business Administration, Associate's of Science in Liberal Arts Biological and Social Science, Associate's of Science in Liberal Arts in Math and Science, Associate's of Arts in Arts and Humanities

work.title: Data Recording Analyst/Operations Coordinator
work.description: Focused on operations and digital marketing of the business. Oversaw e-commerce/third-party delivery services, website, and mail marketing. Managed IT services, POS systems for restaurants, and loyalty reward applications.

work.title: Retail Sales Manager
work.description: Promoted from Lancome Counter Manager and became the Retail Sales Manager. Managed the team of cashiers, maintained sales goals for mass cosmetics, and ran the cash wrap

projects.title: Travel Planner
projects.category: The Travel Planner to allow users to search and manage flights and hotels for their desired dates and cities.

projects.title: Techly
projects.category: CMS-style social networking site where developers can publish posts and comment on other developers post.

projects.title: Pandemopedia
projects.category: Tracker to provide numbers of confirmed cases, active cases, recovered cases, and deaths tolls due to COVID-19.

projects.title: Work Day Scheduler
projects.category: Calendar-style scheduler allowing users to save events for each hour of the day.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.category: A weather app uses server-side API and JavaScript to create a weather dashboard.

projects.title: Movie App
projects.category: An app using React that allows you to search movies. Ability to save coming soon.

projects.title: The Tech Blog
projects.category: A blog where developers can publish their blog posts and comment on other developers post and can create sign up or login into an account.
